data.text: “Unofunga kuti izvi zvakarurama here? Iwe zvaunoti, ‘Ndichanzi ndakarurama naMwari.’
Kunyange zvakadaro unomubvunza uchiti, ‘Zvinondibatsirei, uye ndinowaneiko nokusatadza.’
Kuipa kwako kunongobata munhu akaita sewe,
“Vanhu vanoridza mhere vari pasi pomutoro wokumanikidzwa;
Asi hakuna munhu anoti, ‘Aripiko Mwari Muiti wangu,
anodzidzisa zvakawanda kwatiri kupfuura mhuka dzenyika
Zvirokwazvo, Mwari haateereri chikumbiro chavo chisina maturo;
Saka Jobho anoshamisa muromo wake achitaura zvisina maturo;
